verbs.description: fraternize (third-person singular simple present fraternizes, present participle fraternizing, simple past and past participle fraternized)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To associate with others in a brotherly or friendly manner.
(intransitive) To associate as friends with an enemy, in violation of duty.
(intransitive) To have an intimate or sexual relationship with a forbidden member of the opposite sex; as, in some cases, football players with cheerleaders.
